text: You must not sacrifice to him a bull or sheep that has a blemish or any other defect, because that is considered offensive to the Lord your God.

<st data-num="05921" class="">At</st> the <st data-num="06310" class="">testimony</st> of <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="05707" class="">witnesses</st> the person <st data-num="04191" class="">must</st> be <st data-num="04191" class="">executed</st>. They <st data-num="03808" class="">cannot</st> be <st data-num="04191" class="">put to death</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06310" class="">testimony</st> of only <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="05707" class="">witness</st>.
The witnesses must be first to begin the execution, and then all the people are to join in afterward. In this way you will purge the evil from among you.
If a matter is too difficult for you to judge—bloodshed, legal claim, or assault—matters of controversy in your villages—you must leave there and go up to the place the Lord your God chooses.

You will <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levitical</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> and the <st data-num="08199" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="0834 01961">in office</st> in <st data-num="01992" class="">those</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> and <st data-num="01875" class="">seek a solution</st>; they will <st data-num="05046" class="">render</st> a <st data-num="01697 04941">verdict</st>.
You must then do as they have determined at that place the Lord chooses. Be careful to do just as you are taught.

You must <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="05921 06310 08451 0834">what</st> you are <st data-num="03384" class="">instructed</st>, and <st data-num="05921 04941 0834">the verdict</st> they <st data-num="0559" class="">pronounce</st> to you, without fail. Do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">deviate</st> <st data-num="03225" class="">right</st> or <st data-num="08040" class="">left</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="01697 0834">what</st> they <st data-num="05046" class="">tell</st> you.
The person who pays no attention to the priest currently serving the Lord your God there, or to the judge—that person must die, so that you may purge evil from Israel.
Then all the people will hear and be afraid, and not be so presumptuous again.
When you come to the land the Lord your God is giving you and take it over and live in it and then say, “I will select a king like all the nations surrounding me,”
you must select without fail a king whom the Lord your God chooses. From among your fellow citizens you must appoint a king—you may not designate a foreigner who is not one of your fellow Israelites.
Moreover, he must not accumulate horses for himself or allow the people to return to Egypt to do so, for the Lord has said you must never again return that way.

Furthermore, he must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07235" class="">marry many</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">lest</st> his <st data-num="03824" class="">affections</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">turn aside</st>, and he must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07235" class="">accumulate</st> <st data-num="03966" class="">much</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> and <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>.

When he <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="04467" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st> he must <st data-num="03789" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="04932" class="">copy</st> of <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="05612" class="">scroll</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">given</st> to him <st data-num="06440" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levitical</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st>.
It must be with him constantly, and he must read it as long as he lives, so that he may learn to revere the Lord his God and observe all the words of this law and these statutes and carry them out.
Then he will not exalt himself above his fellow citizens or turn from the commandments to the right or left, and he and his descendants will enjoy many years ruling over his kingdom in Israel.
